scripts.deploy: yarn build && aws s3 sync ./dist s3://alexandria-web-client --delete
scripts.invalidate: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --no-cli-pager --path '/*' --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name alexandria-web-client --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs' | jq 'map({(.ExportName): .OutputValue}) | add' | jq -r '.alexandriaWebClientDistributionId')
